questions.question: What is the minimum safe following distance in good weather?
When should you use your hazard lights?
options: When your vehicle is disabled on the roadway

questions.question: What should you do if your brakes fail?
options: Panic and slam on the emergency brake
Downshift and use the emergency brake gradually

questions.question: In Florida, you must stop for a school bus with flashing red lights:
options: On all roads, regardless of the number of lanes

questions.question: What is the best way to avoid a collision when another driver cuts you off?
options: Honk your horn and flash your lights
Speed up to get ahead of them
Slow down and let them pass
Follow them closely to show your displeasure
